title: Sociodemographic disparities in cardiovascular mortality by self-rated physical health: A U.S. nationwide county-level analysis
content:
Publication date: November 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 236

Author(s): Malak Munir, Wesam Aldosoky, Riyadh Saif, Ahmed Sayed, Arindam Bagga, Ameer Kittaneh, Mostafa Elbanna, Tawseef Dar, Shady Abohashem
